config.better-fireflies.title: Better Fireflies Configuration
config.better-fireflies.enableTimeBasedC: When enabled, firefly bushes will animate only during the configured time window
config.better-fireflies.animationStartTi: Minecraft time of day (0-24000) when fireflies start animating. Default: 12000 (dusk)
config.better-fireflies.animationEndTime: Minecraft time of day (0-24000) when fireflies stop animating. Default: 23000 (dawn)
config.better-fireflies.frozenFrame.tool: Frame number (0-1000) that fireflies display when frozen. Values over the animation's available frames are clamped. For the default firefly texture: 0=off, 9=brightest. Default: 0
